head.supplied: List of the employese ¶ in the Melbourne Botanical Gardens Department that have been discharged and those that are retained with there respective length of service. ¶ can be retained yet if C.S. ¶ d...

div.p: V70/5248, unit 465, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

MS written by a clerk, with the annotations in a different hand. The file includes another sheet with a less complete list of names, and without the salaries and annotations. List originally registered as V70/4978 on 11 May 1870. List of the employese
sic . Not all of the staff named have been identified. Those for whom details have been found have entries in the Biographical Register.
in the Melbourne Botanical Gardens Department that have been discharged and those that are retained with there respective length of service.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.2398in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

cell.p:
Mr Luhmann 4
i.e. Luehmann. The footnote reference number '4' has been misplaced; it refers to George Robertson the engine driver, who was discharged (see G. Robertson to M, 10 May 1870 (in this edition as 70-05-10a)).

cell.p: 3 Carter (his place to be taken by junior) one cart only required

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.1819in;

padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: 5 Understood he was about to leave

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.1819in;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: 6 purposes to tack his duties on to another man who is 5 yrs his senior

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.1819in;

div.p:
The followiing text is linked to the bracketed notes by a line at the side of the page.
can be retained yet if C.S.
Chief Secretary.
desires
